html:
10.14.20  6:58 pm   Is answering these questions sort of like exercise or sort of like punishment>

      ~bEsT oF bOtH wOrLdDs~

10.14.20  6:31 pm   when did you start playing music

      i'm not sure but it was before i could walk or talk

10.14.20  5:58 pm   Is your long long long journey over yet?

      it's just getting started

10.14.20  5:44 pm   will you be releasing new videos in the future?

      oh hell yeah

10.14.20  5:09 pm   Where is beauty found?

      everywhere

10.14.20  4:38 pm   i always get frustrated before finishing any of my drawings, how do i deal with this?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

10.14.20  3:58 pm   what the hell is a convex polygon

      put it this way ..... have you ever seen a polygon with INWARD DENTS? well a convex polygon is any polygon without inward dents. it can have dents but they have to be going outward

10.14.20  3:57 pm   How to be human every day?

      it's different enough each day that you can't figure it out, and yet still the same enough that you still can't figure it out even when you think you've realized how different it is

10.14.20  3:08 pm   Would you agree that you should use Helvetica far more often?

      no, i used almost exclusively helvetica for at least 3 years

10.14.20  2:48 pm   What rules are there

      no being smart or stupid. it only makes you angry you didn't get to pick the other one

10.14.20  1:24 pm   what are you going as for halloween?

      i am not going to halloween. i will be working on various types of videos/songs instead

10.14.20  12:46 pm   What technology advance are you looking forward to in the future?

      international travel

10.14.20  11:07 am   In the video this is my door is the door shown the same one that you revealed was your best friend in the video I'm best friends with my own front door or are these two separate doors?

      the one in the 'best friends' song is a conceptual front door, leading to simple possibilities that exist just outside the most friendly and easy side of one's conceptual house

10.14.20  10:30 am   Do you ever plan on doing live shows, like concerts, when possible? 

      yes

10.14.20  9:25 am   if i like "the stupid song", am i stupid?

      everything is stupid, thanks to the laws of nature

10.14.20  8:27 am   what should i do with my soup ?

      put it into a sandwich

10.14.20  7:56 am   What Inspired You To Write And The Day Goes On?

      thinking about how songwriting might have been, 150 years ago. that was how i came up with the verse melody. And the reason i wrote the rest of it, was because the number 367 out of 367 was chosen by the computer, which was the number that corresponded to that song (which was barely a song yet, at that time) in the song list

10.14.20  6:52 am   About to take my Computer Science Exam in 8 minutes, any tips that could potentially help? 

      yes but i wouldn't be able to give them to you in time, because i'm definitely answering this question more than 8 minutes after you said that

10.14.20  5:24 am   are you enjoying making a new video?

      yes but i am working on ways to enjoy it even more, which would be good news because that would allow me to make more of them and they would be better also

10.14.20  4:07 am   Are goblins real?

      everything is a goblin

10.14.20  3:53 am   it seems like you're currently in panic mode

      i am in regular mode

10.14.20  2:15 am   what is your opinion of triangles

      easy

10.14.20  1:56 am   Do you already know specifically what your next video will be after you finish the one you're currently working on, or have you not thought about it yet?

      there are several different options

10.14.20  12:36 am   also, when was the last time you...did a bad thing?

      i have never done a bad thing. i have only done good things, and a few things that are mildly questionable

10.13.20  11:10 pm   do you like cuckoo clocks

      i respect them

10.13.20  10:58 pm   Why are you so epic?

      could be my ability to blend in seamlessly with the fabric of society

10.13.20  10:53 pm   do you think you can surprise us with what you're working on?

      yes

10.13.20  9:33 pm   what's entropy?

      i'm not sure but i've heard it's bad

10.13.20  8:41 pm   Why is the color black not a color

      it's just too dark.
     i changed my mind, it's not dark enough. and it is a color. and if it is made darker, which it should be, then it will be even more of a color

10.13.20  8:04 pm   do you have any musical theory education?? or anything?? because your songs are genius

      i've been using music for my entire life

10.13.20  7:48 pm   i made a stupid decision which caused harm to many people. i want to take accountability for it, but i'm afraid anything i will do will make the situation worse, now that i figured out that i'm stupid. but it is also unfair to let other people clean my mess. what do i do?

      teach an instructional course about different ways to make decisions

10.13.20  7:07 pm   why are ducks

      to help you understand non-ducks better

10.13.20  6:06 pm   When does your next video come out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.13.20  5:55 pm   How many times have the simplicity police had to send you to jail during the making of your new video? 

      maybe 25 to 50

10.13.20  5:24 pm   is long long journey in f# major

      yes

10.13.20  4:21 pm   just took a picture of a duck, any photo editing tips?

      make sure you label the duck

10.13.20  3:59 pm   Is humanity real?

      oh man that would explain all the people there seem to be everywhere

10.13.20  3:17 pm   Who taught you to learn so much?

      people actually tried to teach me not to learn

10.13.20  2:56 pm   BILL WHAT IS YOUR FONT THAT YOU USE I REALLY LIKE IT 

      regular

10.13.20  2:36 pm   can you teach me a magic trick

      sure

10.13.20  2:14 pm   give me y2k give me it i need it bill i must have it bill

      y2k means the year 2000. the year 2000 was given to all of us, and its remanance remains with us, to this day, along with every other year. Even years that are before our time, are still with us, incorporated into the fabric of every year after

10.13.20  1:28 pm   was the buildup to the bridge in "its gonna be alright" written or improvised?

      i'm sure that's improvised

10.13.20  1:20 pm   How much thought do you usually put into the visuals of your videos? 

      it's usually better to let the feelings do most of the work

10.13.20  12:32 pm   will u make a long music vid?

      i will make one that is 4 minutes and 10 seconds, and also make many many many more that may be slightly shorter than that, and then some non-music videos which may be longer also

10.13.20  12:10 pm   wil you ever give us a real or straight answer?

      you're not even telling me how many people you are

10.13.20  11:50 am   How do you feel about your song, Tuesday, having a day of the week named after it?

      pretty good, they should name the week after more things as well

10.13.20  11:40 am   Any thought on Donald Trump?

      you've heard of donald duck, well, here is donald non-duck

10.13.20  10:32 am   what is soap

      a game

10.13.20  10:21 am   Do you understand the 'deeper' meaning of your songs when you post them, or do you just let othwrs decide what they think the song is about?

      my company policy standard of meaning-level/depth is supposed to be 'mindblowing'. as to whether i can ever live up to that standard, is open to intellectual debate

10.13.20  9:37 am   Why does america do dates weird

      to distract from all the other things they do even weirder
